summary: Biopic loosely based on the last 18 years of Jesse James' life and focused on the relationship between brothers Jesse and Frank James.
cast: Robert Wagner|Jeffrey Hunter|Hope Lange|Agnes Moorehead|Alan Hale Jr.|Alan Baxter|John Carradine|Rachel Stephens|Barney Phillips|Biff Elliot|Frank Overton|Barry Atwater|Marian Seldes|Chubby Johnson|Frank Gorshin|Carl Thayler|John Doucette|Robert Adler|J. Frederik Albeck|Hy Anzell|Ray Bennett|George Blagoi|Phil Bloom|Alexander Campbell|Harry Carter|Ken Christy|Ken Clark|Edmund Cobb|Clancy Cooper|Sally Corner|Duane Cress|George DeNormand|Joe Di Reda|Ray Ferrell|Slim Gaut|Kenneth Gibson|James Gonzalez|Tom Greenway|Lars Hensen|Mark Hickman|Clegg Hoyt|George Huggins|Jason Johnson|Kelly Junge Jr.|Ann Kunde|Kay E. Kuter|Owen McGiveney|Russell Meeker|Forbes Murray|Howard Negley|Tom Pittman|Paul Power|Anthony Ray|Ford Raymond|Ruthie Robinson|Fay Roope|Michael Ross|Gene Roth|Bing Russell|Cosmo Sardo|Aaron Saxon|Ray Spiker|Mike Steen|James Stone|Kelly Thordsen|Paul Weber|Paul Wexler|Bob Whitney|Charles Willcox|Sumner Williams|Jason Wingreen|Jeane Wood|Carleton Young|Louis Zito
title: La verdadera historia de Jesse James
